title: Fear in Her Eyes
description: Daniel Mercer wanted something he couldn’t have. He wanted the woman from his building: the blind musician. The black part of his soul called for him to reach out and take her, to make her beg. He wanted to see the fear in her eyes as he took her from her tidy world.But he needed to protect her. From himself.He was a savage through and through. He'd seen and done things normal men couldn't even imagine. That was why he was head of King security. Unfortunately for her, he couldn't seem to let her go. Her lush curves, delicate beauty and helpless attempts at independence soothed the predator in him.***Addison’s ordered life has gone from perfectly pleasant to terrifying in two crazy missteps:1. Daniel Mercer2. StalkerDaniel stormed into her life in a hail of bullets, saving her life and bullying her with his overbearing non-musical presence. He touched her at every opportunity, lighting up her dark world with a kaleidoscope of colour, then pushing her away whenever she got close to his heart. But will he push her too far, into the arms of the stalker who lurks in the shadows?-- Book five of the Fire & Vice series. All books are standalone and can be read in any order. Guaranteed HEA, NO cheating, NO cliffhanger. Just hot alpha male who knows what he wants! --
author: Nikita Slater
